Peoples Daily bụ akwụkwọ akụkọ di naNigeria
Ewepụtara ya dị ka kwa izu na Nọvemba 2008, ọ ghọrọ kwa ụbọchị na Nọvemba 2009
E weputara Peoples Daily n'usoro n'ememe n'Abuja na Maachị 2010
Onye isi oche nke Board of Directors bụ Malam Wada Abdullahi Maida
Na emume a, Malam Ismaila Isa mere ka o doo anya na, n'agbanyeghị asịrị a na-ekesa, Peoples Daily abụghị nke onye bụbu osote onyeisiala Atiku Abubakar
Kama, ụlọ ọrụ ahụ nwere ihe karịrị ndị ọkachamara mgbasa ozi iri anọ
Na Disemba 2009, ndị ọrụ nke State Security Service nwụchiri onye nchịkọta akụkọ akwụkwọ akụkọ ahụ, Malam Ahmed Shekarau, n'ihi akụkọ banyere ahụike nke President Umaru Yar'Adua na-arịa ọrịa
Shekarau mechara hapụ Peoples Daily banye dịka onye isi njikwa
